popular_themes.title: High ROE, Low Debt
popular_themes.frontend_query: ROE (TTM) > 15 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 0.5
popular_themes.description: Companies with strong return on equity and manageable debt levels

popular_themes.title: Consistent Profit Growth
popular_themes.frontend_query: EPS Growth 3Y > 15 AND EPS Growth 5Y > 12 AND Net Profit Margin (TTM) > 10
popular_themes.description: Companies showing consistent earnings growth over 3-5 years

popular_themes.title: Dividend Aristocrats
popular_themes.frontend_query: Div Yield (TTM) > 2 AND Payout Ratio (TTM) < 60 AND Div Growth 5Y > 5
popular_themes.description: Companies with good dividend yield and consistent dividend growth

popular_themes.title: Quality Large Caps
popular_themes.frontend_query: Market Cap > 50000 AND ROE (TTM) > 15 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 1
popular_themes.description: Large market cap companies with strong fundamentals

popular_themes.title: High Return on Capital
popular_themes.description: Companies efficiently using capital to generate returns

popular_themes.title: Debt-Free Champions
popular_themes.frontend_query: Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 0.25 AND ROE (TTM) > 12
popular_themes.description: Companies with minimal debt and decent profitability

popular_themes.title: Cash Rich Companies
popular_themes.frontend_query: Cash per Share (Ann) > 50 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 0.5
popular_themes.description: Companies with strong cash positions and low debt

popular_themes.title: Growth at Reasonable Price (GARP)
popular_themes.frontend_query: EPS Growth 5Y > 15 AND PE (TTM) < 25 AND ROE (TTM) > 15
popular_themes.description: Growing companies available at reasonable valuations

popular_themes.title: Strong Operating Margins
popular_themes.description: Companies with superior and consistent operating margins

popular_formulas.title: Magic Formula
popular_formulas.description: Joel Greenblatt's magic formula - high returns at low prices

popular_formulas.title: Value Investing
popular_formulas.frontend_query: PE (TTM) < 15 AND Price to Book < 1.5 AND Div Yield (TTM) > 2
popular_formulas.description: Classic value investing approach - low PE, PB with dividends

popular_formulas.title: Peter Lynch Screen
popular_formulas.frontend_query: PEG (TTM) < 1 AND PEG (TTM) > 0 AND EPS Growth TTM YoY > 10
popular_formulas.description: PEG ratio less than 1 with positive earnings growth

popular_formulas.title: Buffett Style
popular_formulas.frontend_query: ROE 5Y > 15 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 0.5 AND Net Profit Margin 5Y > 10
popular_formulas.description: High ROE, low debt, consistent margins - Buffett's criteria

popular_formulas.title: High Dividend Yield
popular_formulas.description: High dividend yield with sustainable payout ratios

popular_formulas.title: Low PE, High Growth
popular_formulas.frontend_query: PE (TTM) < 15 AND EPS Growth TTM YoY > 20 AND Revenue Growth TTM YoY > 15
popular_formulas.description: Undervalued stocks with strong growth momentum

popular_formulas.title: Graham's Value Screen
popular_formulas.frontend_query: PE (TTM) < 15 AND Price to Book < 1.5 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 1

popular_formulas.title: Quality at Fair Price
popular_formulas.frontend_query: ROE (TTM) > 18 AND PE (TTM) < 30 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 0.5
popular_formulas.description: High quality companies at reasonable valuations

price_or_volume.title: 52 Week High Breakout
price_or_volume.description: Stocks trading near or at their 52-week highs

price_or_volume.title: 52 Week Low Bounce
price_or_volume.description: Quality stocks near 52-week lows - potential value opportunities

price_or_volume.title: Strong YTD Performance
price_or_volume.description: Stocks with strong year-to-date price performance

price_or_volume.title: High Volume Movers
price_or_volume.description: Stocks with high trading volumes indicating strong interest

price_or_volume.title: Momentum Stocks
price_or_volume.description: Stocks showing strong price momentum over multiple timeframes

price_or_volume.title: Oversold Quality Stocks
price_or_volume.frontend_query: 52W Price Return < -20 AND ROE (TTM) > 15 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 1
price_or_volume.description: Quality companies that have corrected significantly

price_or_volume.title: Strong Weekly Returns
price_or_volume.description: Stocks with strong recent performance and good liquidity

price_or_volume.title: Low Volatility Quality
price_or_volume.frontend_query: Beta < 0.8 AND ROE (TTM) > 12 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 0.5
price_or_volume.description: Stable quality stocks with low market volatility

quarterly_results.title: Strong Quarterly Growth
quarterly_results.frontend_query: EPS Growth Qtr YoY > 25 AND Revenue Growth Qtr YoY > 20

quarterly_results.title: Improving Margins
quarterly_results.frontend_query: Op Margin (TTM) > Op Margin (Ann) AND Net Profit Margin (TTM) > Net Profit Margin (Ann)

quarterly_results.title: Consistent Quarterly Performers
quarterly_results.frontend_query: Qtr Profit Var % > 15 AND Qtr Sales Var % > 10
quarterly_results.description: Companies with consistent quarterly sales and profit growth

quarterly_results.title: Revenue Acceleration
quarterly_results.frontend_query: Revenue Growth Qtr YoY > Revenue Growth TTM YoY AND Revenue Growth Qtr YoY > 20

quarterly_results.title: Positive Earnings Surprise
quarterly_results.frontend_query: EPS Growth Qtr YoY > 30 AND EPS Growth TTM YoY > 20

quarterly_results.title: Quarterly Profit Leaders
quarterly_results.frontend_query: Qtr Profit Var % > 20 AND Net Profit Margin (TTM) > 12
quarterly_results.description: Strong quarterly profit growth with healthy margins

quarterly_results.title: Sales Growth Acceleration
quarterly_results.frontend_query: Qtr Sales Var % > 15 AND Revenue Growth 3Y > 12

valuation_screens.title: Undervalued Gems
valuation_screens.frontend_query: PE (TTM) < 12 AND Price to Book < 1.5 AND ROE (TTM) > 12
valuation_screens.description: Low PE and PB with decent profitability

valuation_screens.title: Low PE Quality
valuation_screens.frontend_query: PE (TTM) < 15 AND ROE (TTM) > 15 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 0.5
valuation_screens.description: Quality companies trading at attractive PE ratios

valuation_screens.title: Low Price to Book
valuation_screens.frontend_query: Price to Book < 1 AND ROE (TTM) > 10 AND BV Growth 5Y > 8
valuation_screens.description: Stocks trading below book value with growing book value

valuation_screens.title: Low EV/EBITDA
valuation_screens.frontend_query: EV to EBITDA (TTM) < 10 AND EV to EBITDA (TTM) > 0 AND EBITDA CAGR 5Y > 10
valuation_screens.description: Companies with attractive enterprise value to EBITDA ratios

valuation_screens.title: Low Price to Sales
valuation_screens.frontend_query: Price to Sales (TTM) < 1 AND Net Profit Margin (TTM) > 5 AND Revenue Growth 5Y > 10
valuation_screens.description: Companies trading at low price-to-sales with profitability

valuation_screens.title: High Free Cash Flow Yield
valuation_screens.frontend_query: Price to FCF (TTM) < 15 AND Price to FCF (TTM) > 0 AND FOCF CAGR 5Y > 10
valuation_screens.description: Companies generating strong free cash flow relative to price

valuation_screens.title: Cheap Growth Stocks
valuation_screens.frontend_query: PE (TTM) < 20 AND EPS Growth 5Y > 15 AND Revenue Growth 5Y > 12
valuation_screens.description: Growing companies available at reasonable valuations

valuation_screens.title: Forward PE Value
valuation_screens.frontend_query: Forward PE < 12 AND Forward PE > 0 AND EPS Growth TTM YoY > 10
valuation_screens.description: Low forward PE with positive earnings growth

valuation_screens.title: Price to Cash Flow Value
valuation_screens.frontend_query: Price to CF (TTM) < 10 AND Cash Flow per Share (Ann) > 10
valuation_screens.description: Stocks with attractive price to cash flow ratios

fundamental_strength.title: High Return on Investment
fundamental_strength.description: Companies delivering strong returns on investment

fundamental_strength.title: Margin Leaders
fundamental_strength.frontend_query: Net Profit Margin (TTM) > 15 AND Op Margin (TTM) > 20

fundamental_strength.title: Cash Flow Champions
fundamental_strength.frontend_query: Cash Flow per Share (Ann) > 20 AND FOCF CAGR 5Y > 15
fundamental_strength.description: Companies with strong and growing cash flows

fundamental_strength.title: Asset Light Business
fundamental_strength.frontend_query: ROA (TTM) > 15 AND ROE (TTM) > 20 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 0.3
fundamental_strength.description: High ROA and ROE with minimal debt - asset-light models

fundamental_strength.title: High Revenue per Employee
fundamental_strength.frontend_query: Revenue per Emp (Ann) > 10 AND Net Income per Emp (TTM) > 0.5
fundamental_strength.description: Companies with high productivity per employee

fundamental_strength.title: Strong Balance Sheet
fundamental_strength.frontend_query: Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 0.3 AND Cash per Share (Ann) > 30 AND ROE (TTM) > 12

fundamental_strength.title: Consistent ROE
fundamental_strength.description: Companies with consistently high return on equity

fundamental_strength.title: Operating Efficiency
fundamental_strength.frontend_query: Op Margin (TTM) > 18 AND Op Margin 5Y > 15 AND ROA (TTM) > 10

growth_screens.title: Super Growth Stocks
growth_screens.frontend_query: Revenue Growth 5Y > 25 AND EPS Growth 5Y > 25 AND ROE (TTM) > 15
growth_screens.description: Companies with exceptional growth in revenue and earnings

growth_screens.title: Sales Growth Leaders
growth_screens.frontend_query: Revenue Growth TTM YoY > 30 AND Revenue Growth 5Y > 20
growth_screens.description: Companies with strong and consistent revenue growth

growth_screens.title: Earnings Growth Leaders
growth_screens.frontend_query: EPS Growth TTM YoY > 30 AND EPS Growth 5Y > 20 AND Net Profit Margin (TTM) > 10
growth_screens.description: Companies with strong earnings growth and profitability

growth_screens.title: Book Value Growth
growth_screens.description: Companies growing their book value consistently

growth_screens.title: High CapEx Growth
growth_screens.description: Companies investing heavily in growth while maintaining profitability

growth_screens.title: EBITDA Growth Leaders
growth_screens.frontend_query: EBITDA CAGR 5Y > 20 AND EBITDA Int CAGR 5Y > 15

growth_screens.title: Revenue Per Share Growth
growth_screens.frontend_query: Revenue Share Growth 5Y > 15 AND Revenue Growth 5Y > 12
growth_screens.description: Companies growing revenue per share consistently

growth_screens.title: EPS Growth Momentum
growth_screens.frontend_query: EPS Growth 3Y > 20 AND EPS Growth 5Y > 18 AND EPS Growth TTM YoY > 15

growth_screens.title: Tangible Book Value Growth
growth_screens.description: Companies growing tangible book value with profitability

dividend_screens.title: High Dividend Yield
dividend_screens.frontend_query: Div Yield (TTM) > 4 AND Payout Ratio (TTM) < 70 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 1
dividend_screens.description: High dividend yield with sustainable payout and manageable debt

dividend_screens.title: Stable Dividend Payers
dividend_screens.frontend_query: Div Yield (TTM) > 3 AND Payout Ratio (TTM) < 50 AND ROE (TTM) > 12
dividend_screens.description: Reliable dividend payers with room for growth

dividend_screens.title: Dividend Yield with Growth
dividend_screens.frontend_query: Div Yield (TTM) > 3 AND Div Growth 5Y > 8 AND EPS Growth 5Y > 10
dividend_screens.description: High yield with dividend and earnings growth

momentum_screens.title: Multi-Timeframe Momentum
momentum_screens.frontend_query: 5D Price Return > 3 AND 13W Price Return > 15 AND 26W Price Return > 25
momentum_screens.description: Stocks showing momentum across multiple timeframes

momentum_screens.title: Strong Annual Momentum
momentum_screens.description: Stocks with strong annual returns and profitability

momentum_screens.title: YTD Winners
momentum_screens.frontend_query: YTD Price Return > 40 AND Market Cap > 5000
momentum_screens.description: Year-to-date winners with decent market cap

momentum_screens.title: Monthly Momentum
momentum_screens.frontend_query: MTD Price Return > 10 AND 3M Avg Volume > 500000
momentum_screens.description: Strong monthly performance with good liquidity

quality_screens.title: Quality at Any Price
quality_screens.frontend_query: ROE (TTM) > 20 AND ROCE % > 25 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 0.5
quality_screens.description: Highest quality companies regardless of valuation

quality_screens.title: Consistent Performers
quality_screens.frontend_query: ROE 5Y > 15 AND Net Profit Margin 5Y > 10 AND Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 0.5
quality_screens.description: Companies with consistent performance over 5 years

quality_screens.title: Financial Fortress
quality_screens.frontend_query: Total Debt to Equity (Ann) < 0.2 AND Cash per Share (Ann) > 50 AND ROE (TTM) > 15

quality_screens.title: Profit Margin Excellence
quality_screens.frontend_query: Net Profit Margin (TTM) > 20 AND Net Profit Margin 5Y > 15 AND Op Margin (TTM) > 25
quality_screens.description: Companies with exceptional and consistent margins
